Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

I\'m Bartkov. I\'ve been playing the demo for a few days now, and it\'s just too fun to stop. The developers are making a damn good job with KSP, and seeing that it\'s such an early version, I can\'t wait for further additions. It\'s going to be a great game... no, wait, it already is ^^

Such a radness overload.

I have some questions and ideas, but I\'ll save them for their appropriate threads.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
